item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

1/9/2012's location will be:

Zafra: Cuban Restaurant and Rum Bar

Zafra is an Awesome Rum bar that opened this past spring in downtown.  Located on Orange Street just before the intersection with Elm, (Next to Christy's) this restaurant brings excellent competition to the Cuban cuisine in New Haven.  The food portions have been generous, and the various Rum based drinks are Delicious. (My personal favorites here are the "Release the Kraken" and "La Zafra" cocktails.)  A couple collective members have rated this amongst the Best Mojitos in town, and probably the best 'Dark and Stormy' I've ever had.  They have a selection of Over 125 Rums to chose from, making them currently the largest selection Rum Bar in the US!

The Owner (Dominick) has Generously offered the following Specials:

"Mojito Monday" featuring $5 Mojitos

$3 Glasses of Wine (If they still have it, I like the Tannat)

$4 Draft Beers

$3 Bottled Imported Beer (I recommend Xingu.)

Select Appetizers will be 1/2 Price!

A.J. will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348.

Please RSVP for this event when able to give Dominick a heads up.

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

For more information about the Bar, please visit: www.zafrarumbar.com﻿

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***

﻿
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host and we're most likely the largest group at the Bar on a Monday.
item.name: Happy Hour - ZAFRA
